testcase.classname: Buy the product from automation practise Url
testcase.name: place the order and store order confirmation ID in excel workbook
testcase.system-out: Given open chrome driver browser and launch the automation practise url.....passed When I clicked on signin button.............................................passed And I entered Login credentials and clicked on login button.................passed And I entered productName in search box and clicked on search button........passed And I added product to the cart.............................................passed And I Checked out the product...............................................passed And I completed the payment.................................................passed Then I stored the order conformation ID into excel workbook.................passed And I clicked on sign out button............................................passed
